scripts.build: (cd react && yarn && yarn build) && (cd react-ticker && yarn && yarn build)
scripts.rebuild: dfx canister create --all && dfx build && dfx generate && cp -r src/declarations react/src/ && cp -r src/declarations react-ticker/src/
scripts.generate: dfx generate heartbeat && dfx generate ticker2 && cp -r src/declarations react/src/ && cp -r src/declarations react-ticker/src/
